responsibilities: Manage the deployment of AI models to solve real-world complex problems in global supply chain and manufacturing.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Engineering, Design, Product Management, and industry experts to build high-quality product features that can be used by major companies around the world.
Take on new challenges and responsibilities as needed, and be an enthusiastic team player in a dynamic startup environment.
Help shape the company by participating in hiring decisions and contributing to our culture of continuous learning and growth.
qualifications: Strong understanding of training models in distributed multi-node GPU environments.
Experience with data engineering technologies, such as Airflow, Spark, Trino, Flink, or BigQuery.
Familiarity with Python and PyTorch, Tensorflow, or JAX.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, capable of articulating complex technical concepts to diverse audiences.
A strong desire to learn, grow, and drive impact on real global problems—and to help others around you do the same.
analysis:
The job responsibilities include managing the deployment of AI models to solve complex problems, collaborating with cross-functional teams to build high-quality product features, and participating in hiring and company culture. The skills required include a strong understanding of training models in distributed multi-node GPU environments, experience with data engineering technologies, familiarity with Python and machine learning frameworks like PyTorch, Tensorflow, or JAX, and excellent communication skills.

The mention of "training models in distributed multi-node GPU environments" and familiarity with machine learning frameworks suggests that the job involves working with AI models. However, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be on AI models in general, possibly for applications in supply chain and manufacturing, rather than specifically on GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, based on the provided information, it is not clear that the job specifically involves working with Generative AI or language models.
